pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, February 11, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, February 11, 2016:

Ottawa

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with United Nations Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon.

Centre Block, Office of the Prime Minister
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should gather in the House of Commons Foyer for 10:30 a.m.


12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint media availability with United Nations Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon.

House of Commons Foyer
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Media should gather in the House of Commons Foyer for 11:30 a.m.


1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of the Northwest Territories, Bob McLeod.

Centre Block, Office of the Prime Minister
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should gather in the House of Commons Foyer for 1:00 p.m.


2:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a student assembly with United Nations Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon.

Glebe Collegiate Institute
212 Glebe Avenue
Ottawa, ON

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive at the East entrance
  • Media should arrive no later than 1:30 p.m.


Gatineau

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minster and Madame Gr√©goire Trudeau will host a dinner for the United Nations Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon and Mrs. Ban Soon-taek.

Grand Gallery
Canadian Museum of History
100 Rue Laurier
Gatineau, QC

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive at the main entrance
  • Media should arrive no later than 5:00 p.m.


PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
